SELECT
AS ConfiguredRequestRate,
AS BindRateTolerance,
AS EnableDhcpv4,
AS EnableDhcpv6,
AS EnableDhcpv4v6,
AS EnableClientDhcpv6,
AS EnableClientDhcpv6Pd,
AS ExpectedSessionCount

sql_statement.static: SELECT IterCfg.Iteration AS 'Iteration', IterCfg.IterState AS 'IterationMode', cfg.Name AS 'DeviceName', COALESCE(res.PortName, 'N/A') AS 'PortName',cfg.DeviceCount AS 'DeviceCount', COALESCE(res.TotalBoundCount,0) AS 'TotalBoundCount', COALESCE(res.TotalFailedCount, cfg.DeviceCount) AS 'TotalFailedCount', COALESCE(res.TotalRetriedCount,0) AS 'TotalRetriedCount', COALESCE(res.TotalRenewedCount,0) AS 'TotalRenewedCount', DC.ConfiguredRequestRate AS 'ConfigRequestRate', COALESCE(res.BindRate,0) AS 'BindRate', COALESCE(res.AttemptRate,0) AS 'AttemptRate', DC.BindRateTolerance AS 'BindRateTolerance', COALESCE(res.ElapsedTime,'N/A') AS 'ElapsedTime' FROM (Select dev.Name, dev.DeviceCount, dhcp.Handle FROM Dhcpv4BlockConfig AS dhcp LEFT JOIN EmulatedDevice AS dev ON dhcp.ParentHnd == dev.Handle) as cfg LEFT JOIN Dhcpv4BlockResults AS res ON res.ParentHnd == cfg.Handle LEFT JOIN xDhcpConfiguration AS DC LEFT JOIN spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS IterCfg

SELECT IterCfg.Iteration, PortName, IterCfg.IterState AS 'IterationMode', IterCfg.CurrVal AS 'ExpectedSessions', PR.TotalBoundCount, PR.TotalFailedCount, PR.TotalRetriedCount, PR.TotalRenewedCount, PC.RequestRate AS 'ConfigRequestRate', PR.BindRate, PR.AttemptRate, PR.MinSetupTime, PR.MaxSetupTime, PR.AvgSetupTime, DC.BindRateTolerance AS 'BindRateTolerance', (SELECT MAX(ElapsedTime) FROM Dhcpv4BlockResults) AS 'ElapsedTime' FROM Dhcpv4PortConfig AS PC JOIN Dhcpv4PortResults AS PR JOIN xDhcpConfiguration as DC JOIN spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS IterCfg WHERE PC.Handle == PR.ParentHnd

SELECT IterCfg.Iteration, IterCfg.IterState AS 'IterationMode', (SELECT SUM(ED.DeviceCount) FROM EmulatedDevice AS ED JOIN Dhcpv4BlockConfig AS DBC WHERE ED.Handle == DBC.ParentHnd) AS 'TotalExpectedSessions', SUM(PR.TotalBoundCount) AS 'TotalBoundCount', SUM(PR.TotalFailedCount) AS 'TotalFailedCount', SUM(PR.TotalRetriedCount) AS 'TotalRetriedCount', SUM(PR.TotalRenewedCount) AS 'TotalRenewedCount', SUM(PC.RequestRate) AS 'TotalConfigRequestRate', SUM(PR.BindRate) AS 'TotalBindRate', SUM(PR.AttemptRate) AS 'TotalAttemptRate', MIN(PR.MinSetupTime) AS 'MinSetupTime', MAX(PR.MaxSetupTime) AS 'MaxSetupTime', AVG(PR.AvgSetupTime) AS 'AvgSetupTime', DC.BindRateTolerance AS 'BindRateTolerance', (SELECT MAX(ElapsedTime) FROM Dhcpv4BlockResults) AS 'TotalElapsedTime' FROM Dhcpv4PortConfig AS PC JOIN Dhcpv4PortResults AS PR JOIN xDhcpConfiguration as DC JOIN spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS IterCfg WHERE PC.Handle == PR.ParentHnd

sql_statement.static: SELECT Iteration, CASE WHEN DeviceCount != TotalBoundCount OR TotalFailedCount > 0 OR TotalRetriedCount > 0 THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END AS 'Verdict', IterationMode AS 'Iteration State', PortName AS 'Port Name', DeviceName AS 'Device Name', DeviceCount AS 'Expected Session Count', TotalBoundCount AS 'Total Bound Count', TotalFailedCount AS 'Total Failed Count', TotalRetriedCount AS 'Total Retried Count', TotalRenewedCount AS 'Total Renewed Count', BindRate AS 'Bind Rate (sessions/s)', AttemptRate AS 'Attempt Rate (sessions/s)', BindRateTolerance AS 'Bind Rate Tolerance (%)', ElapsedTime AS 'Elapsed Time (s)' FROM xDHCPv4_Block_Iteration_Results

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: All DHCPv4 sessions were bound with no errors detected.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT COUNT(*)=0
FROM xDHCPv4_Block_Iteration_Results WHERE (TotalBoundCount != DeviceCount OR TotalFailedCount > 0 OR TotalRetriedCount > 0)

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Not all DHCPv4 sessions were bound and/or failures were detected.

sql_statement.static: SELECT PortName AS 'Port Name', DeviceName AS 'Device Name', DeviceCount AS 'Expected Session Count', TotalBoundCount AS 'Total Bound Count', TotalFailedCount AS 'Total Failed Count', TotalRetriedCount AS 'Total Retried Count', TotalRenewedCount AS 'Total Renewed Count' FROM xDHCPv4_Block_Iteration_Results

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: DHCPv4 Bind Rate is within the configured threshold of Attempt Rate.

sql_for_verdict.static: SELECT COUNT(*)=0
FROM xDHCPv4_Block_Iteration_Results WHERE BindRate==0 OR AttemptRate==0 OR BindRate < (AttemptRate * (100 - BindRateTolerance)/100) OR BindRate > (AttemptRate * (100 + BindRateTolerance)/100)

report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: DHCPv4 Bind Rate is not within the configured threshold of Attempt Rate or zero Bind and/or Attempt Rate detected.

sql_statement.static: SELECT IterCfg.Iteration AS 'Iteration', IterCfg.IterState AS 'IterationMode', cfg.Name AS 'DeviceName', COALESCE(res.PortName, 'N/A') AS 'PortName',cfg.DeviceCount AS 'DeviceCount', COALESCE(res.TotalBoundCount,0) AS 'TotalBoundCount', COALESCE(res.TotalFailedCount, cfg.DeviceCount) AS 'TotalFailedCount', COALESCE(res.TotalRetriedCount,0) AS 'TotalRetriedCount', COALESCE(res.TotalRenewedCount,0) AS 'TotalRenewedCount', DC.ConfiguredRequestRate AS 'ConfigRequestRate', COALESCE(res.BindRate,0) AS 'BindRate', COALESCE(res.AttemptRate,0) AS 'AttemptRate', DC.BindRateTolerance AS 'BindRateTolerance', COALESCE(res.ElapsedTime,'N/A') AS 'ElapsedTime' FROM (Select dev.Name, dev.DeviceCount, dhcp.Handle FROM Dhcpv6BlockConfig AS dhcp LEFT JOIN EmulatedDevice AS dev ON dhcp.ParentHnd == dev.Handle) as cfg LEFT JOIN Dhcpv6BlockResults AS res ON res.ParentHnd == cfg.Handle LEFT JOIN xDhcpConfiguration AS DC LEFT JOIN spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS IterCfg

SELECT IterCfg.Iteration, PortName, IterCfg.IterState AS 'IterationMode', IterCfg.CurrVal AS 'ExpectedSessions', PR.TotalBoundCount, PR.TotalFailedCount, PR.TotalRetriedCount, PR.TotalRenewedCount, PC.RequestRate AS 'ConfigRequestRate', PR.BindRate, PR.AttemptRate, PR.MinSetupTime, PR.MaxSetupTime, PR.AvgSetupTime, DC.BindRateTolerance AS 'BindRateTolerance', (SELECT MAX(ElapsedTime) FROM Dhcpv6BlockResults) AS 'ElapsedTime' FROM Dhcpv6PortConfig AS PC JOIN Dhcpv6PortResults AS PR JOIN xDhcpConfiguration as DC JOIN spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS IterCfg WHERE PC.Handle == PR.ParentHnd

SELECT IterCfg.Iteration, IterCfg.IterState AS 'IterationMode', (SELECT SUM(ED.DeviceCount) FROM EmulatedDevice AS ED JOIN Dhcpv6BlockConfig AS DBC WHERE ED.Handle == DBC.ParentHnd) AS 'TotalExpectedSessions', SUM(PR.TotalBoundCount) AS 'TotalBoundCount', SUM(PR.TotalFailedCount) AS 'TotalFailedCount', SUM(PR.TotalRetriedCount) AS 'TotalRetriedCount',  SUM(PR.TotalRenewedCount) AS 'TotalRenewedCount', SUM(PC.RequestRate) AS 'TotalConfigRequestRate', SUM(PR.BindRate) AS 'TotalBindRate', SUM(PR.AttemptRate) AS 'TotalAttemptRate', MIN(PR.MinSetupTime) AS 'MinSetupTime', MAX(PR.MaxSetupTime) AS 'MaxSetupTime', AVG(PR.AvgSetupTime) AS 'AvgSetupTime', DC.BindRateTolerance AS 'BindRateTolerance', (SELECT MAX(ElapsedTime) FROM Dhcpv6BlockResults) AS 'TotalElapsedTime' FROM Dhcpv6PortConfig AS PC JOIN Dhcpv6PortResults AS PR JOIN xDhcpConfiguration as DC JOIN spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS IterCfg WHERE PC.Handle == PR.ParentHnd

FROM xDHCPv6_Block_Iteration_Results WHERE BindRate==0 OR AttemptRate==0 OR BindRate < (AttemptRate * (100 - BindRateTolerance)/100) OR BindRate > (AttemptRate * (100 + BindRateTolerance)/100)

sql_statement.static: SELECT EnableStabilityBackoff, MinVal AS SearchMinVal, MaxVal AS SearchMaxVal, RepeatCount AS StabilityRepeatCount, StepVal AS StabilityBackoffStep, SuccessPercent AS StabilitySuccessPercent, IsConverged, ConvergedVal, FoundStableValue, StableValue FROM spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand WHERE (SELECT Iter.Handle FROM Tag AS Tag, RelationTable AS RT, spirent_methodology_BenchmarkStabilityIteratorCommand AS Iter)

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: DHCP Session Scale Test Configuration Settings.
report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Error retrieving DHCP scale test configuration settings.

sql_statement.static: SELECT SearchMinVal AS 'Search Minimum Session Count', SearchMaxVal AS 'Search Maximum Session Count', (CASE WHEN EnableStabilityBackoff = 1 THEN 'True' ELSE 'False' END) AS 'Enable Stability Backoff', StabilityRepeatCount AS 'Stability Repeat Count', StabilityBackoffStep AS 'Stability Backoff Step', StabilitySuccessPercent AS 'Stability Backoff Success (%)', ExpectedSessionCount AS 'Session Count Threshold' FROM Dhcp_IteratorEndState, xDhcpConfigInfo
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS DHCPScaleSessionCount (ConvergedSessionCount INTEGER, StableSessionCount INTEGER, ExpectedSessionCount INTEGER)
SELECT (CASE WHEN IsConverged = 0 THEN 'Did not converge' ELSE ConvergedVal END) AS 'ConvergedSessionCount',

(case when EnableStabilityBackoff = 0 then 'Stability test disabled' when EnableStabilityBackoff = 1 and FoundStableValue = 0 then 'No stable session rate found'  when EnableStabilityBackoff = 1 and FoundStableValue > 0 then StableValue end ) AS StableSessionCount,
(SELECT ExpectedSessionCount FROM xDhcpConfigInfo) AS ExpectedSessionCount from Dhcp_IteratorEndState

report.explanation: Converged session count and stable session count meet the session count threshold.

report_verdict.passed_verdict_explanation: Converged session count and stable session count meet the session count threshold.
report_verdict.failed_verdict_explanation: Converged session count or Stable session count is less than the session count threshold.

sql_for_verdict.static: select case when (EnableStabilityBackoff = 1 and FoundStableValue = 0) or (IsConverged = 0) or (IsConverged = 1 and cast(ConvergedVal as INTEGER) < (SELECT ExpectedSessionCount FROM xDhcpConfigInfo)) or (FoundStableValue=1 AND cast(StableValue as INTEGER)< (SELECT ExpectedSessionCount FROM xDhcpConfigInfo)) then 0 else 1 end from Dhcp_IteratorEndState

sql_statement.static: select ConvergedSessionCount as 'Converged Session Count', StableSessionCount as 'Stable Session Count',  ExpectedSessionCount as 'Session Count Threshold' from DHCPScaleSessionCount
SELECT CASE WHEN EnableDhcpv4='0' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM xDhcpConfigInfo
